name: Simulate index matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.19.7-167ce63ff1236a16cf71304f35cc3bc2c0c9f9db "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
